entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 1300 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:54 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1500 metres rising to 1800 metres in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:54 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1600 metres lowering to 900 metres overnight. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then becoming light after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:54 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
